name: 洪晉鈺
objective:
整合學科與術科兩大部分，本課程介紹【建築物室內設計】與【建築物室內裝修工程管理】專業技能檢定事宜。參酌最新專業議題並研習歷屆考試題庫，課程加強學／術科模擬考試訓練，期使學校養成教育與設計界之專業需求得以結合。
Integrating the Knowledge and Technology parts of the Interior design profession, the course introduces the practice of National Skill Test of Interior design and Project Management. Concerning not just the updated ideas and the historical questions, it stresses also the intensive stimulated test so as to link the educational achievement and the professional expectation.
